text: amazon work docks is a fully managed
secure enterprise document storage and
sharing service in this short video will
show you an overview of some key
features and benefits of Amazon work
docks as Amazon work docks integrates
with corporate directories users can
sign in with our existing credentials to
get started and administrators can limit
access to the service to authorized
users it's easy to add a file via the
add content button or simply using drag
and drop the Amazon work doc sync client
make sure that any files stored in
Amazon work docks will sync
automatically allowing access across
multiple devices users can see a preview
of files in common formats such as
Microsoft Office documents PDFs images
and text files all without requiring the
installation of the source application
users can easily share files both
internally and externally depending on
the administrators configuration to
share a file simply choose who to share
with on a message and set an optional
feedback deadline
users receive email reminders to provide
feedback as deadlines approach to make a
comment users can highlight a specific
region or provide overall feedback on
the file Microsoft Word documents can be
downloaded with the feedback included as
comments amazon work Docs makes it easy
to work through the revision process by
keeping a copy of every version of every
document administrators can also view
user activity in the audit log us amazon
work Docs is fully managed there is
nothing additional to purchase maintain
or deploy and you can get started with a
30-day free trial for up to 50 users
visit the AWS management console and
setup amazon work docks today
you
